"Switching the Main Palette":
"The \"Main Palette\" is the system that lets you register a weapon and a set of PAs/Techniques together so that you can switch between them easily.

If you register multiple different weapons on your Main Palette, you can switch weapons quickly in the middle of battle."

"To switch your Main Palette, follow these steps:

・Cycle to previous Main Palette: <%PaletteReverse>
・Cycle to next Main Palette: <%PaletteForce>
・Switch to selected palette: <%Decide>"
